switchboard_connection_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Switchboard

Switchboard Connection. More...

#include <switchboard.h>

Detailed Description

A switchboard connection defines input and output terminals as well as the number of bytes to transfer.

See also
switchboard_status_t
